overview:
Greg Willis is a Media & Entertainment Executive who leverages expertise in sales, operations management, IT, business development, distribution, ad sales, and marketing to improve revenue, profit, and shareholder value. Strong work ethic, vision, and competitive nature.

Willis a Media & Entertainment expert with over 25 years of experience in the cable, satellite, broadband, and broadcast.

Willis currently holds the position of Client Sales Executive with HP Enterprise Services. Willis works with Communications, Media & Entertainment clients to providing managed and outsources services.

Successful track record in growing revenue and EBITDA while working for leading media and technology company’s such as HBO, Food Network, Liberty Media, MTV Networks, Interactive Video Technology, PanAmSat, WheelsTV, Ascent Media Group, and Hewlett Packard.
